text: Fancy is the surname of: * John Fancy (1913-2008), British Second World War airman and prisoner of war whose escapes inspired the book and film The Great Escape * Richard Fancy (born 1943), American actor * Stuart Fancy (born 1959), British chess FIDE Master who competes for Papua New Guinean * Arthur Fancy, a character on the TV series NYPD Blue
title: Fancy (surname)
